name: Grove Collaborative Holdings, Inc.
description: Grove Collaborative Holdings, Inc. is a leading direct-to-consumer e-commerce platform dedicated to providing sustainable and eco-friendly household and personal care products. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in San Francisco, California, Grove Collaborative aims to make sustainable living easy and accessible for everyone. The company offers a wide range of products, including cleaning supplies, personal care items, and baby products, all of which are made with non-toxic, plant-based ingredients. Grove Collaborative is committed to reducing plastic waste and has implemented a refill and recycling program to encourage customers to minimize their environmental impact. The company emphasizes transparency in its sourcing and packaging, ensuring that all products are ethically produced and environmentally friendly. With a subscription model that allows customers to receive their favorite products regularly, Grove Collaborative has cultivated a loyal customer base that values sustainability and convenience. Through its innovative approach, Grove Collaborative not only supports conscious consumerism but also partners with various organizations to promote environmental stewardship and sustainability initiatives. The company's mission is to inspire and empower individuals and families to make choices that benefit both their health and the planet.

seo.meta_title: Grove Collaborative | Sustainable Household and Personal Care Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Grove Collaborative, a leader in eco-friendly household products. Discover sustainable living solutions that benefit your health and the planet.

faq.question: What is Grove Collaborative known for?
faq.answer: Grove Collaborative is known for its sustainable and eco-friendly household and personal care products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Grove Collaborative?
faq.answer: Alexandra M. DeLuca is the CEO of Grove Collaborative Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Grove Collaborative headquartered?
faq.answer: Grove Collaborative is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Grove Collaborative offer?
faq.answer: Grove Collaborative offers a variety of products including cleaning supplies, personal care items, and baby products.
